metadata.title: Lenox 2019 Under the Mistletoe with Marcel the Moose Ornament
description: Crafted of durable white ceramic porcelain, this annual ornament features Marcel the Moose, who is adorned with a classic red Santa hat and lights across his mighty antlers.
